Previous: ṛdhNext: ej

√ṛṣ 'rush, push'

present: [1.] árṣati etc.  arṣase   -- [6.] ṛṣáti etc.  

perfect: ānarṣat  

[aorist: ārṣīt  arṣiṣyati  arṣitā  ]

verbal: ṛṣṭa  arṣitvā  

[secondary: arṣiṣiṣa-  arṣaya-  ]

derivatives: -arṣa  -árṣaṇa B.  arṣaṇī́ AV.  -árṣu RV.  arṣṭṛ́ B.  ṛṣabhá V.+  ṛ́ṣi V.+  ṛṣú RV.  ṛṣṭí V.+  ṛṣvá V.B.  

Hardly calls for the usual division into two roots. Some of the derivatives doubtful.
